verses.verse: <S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> During <S%G1722><s%> The Time <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Pressed On <S%G1945><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lake <S%G3041><s%> Of Gennesaret : <S%G1082><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Ships <S%G4143><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lake, <S%G3041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Fishermen <S%G231><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G576><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Washed <S%G637><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nets. <S%G1350><s%>

<S%G1684><s%> And Having Entered <S%G1161><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ships <S%G4143><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Simon's, <S%G4613><s%> He Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> To Put Off <S%G1877><s%> A Little; <S%G3641><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sat Down <S%G2523><s%> He Taught <S%G1321><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds. <S%G3793><s%>

<S%G5613><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> He Ceased <S%G3973><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Put Off <S%G1877><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deep <S%G899><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Down <S%G5465><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1350><s%> Your Nets <S%G5216><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Haul. <S%G61><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%>, To Him, <S%G846><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> Having Laboured, <S%G2872><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> <S%G2983><s%> Have We Taken, <S%G1909><s%> But At <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4487><s%> Thy Word <S%G4675><s%> I Will Let Down <S%G5465><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Net. <S%G1350><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Having Done <S%G4160><s%> They Enclosed <S%G4788><s%> Of Fishes <S%G2486><s%> A Shoal <S%G4128><s%> Great; <S%G4183><s%> Was Breaking <S%G1284><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Net <S%G1350><s%> Their. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Beckoned <S%G2656><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Partners <S%G3353><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Ship, <S%G4143><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That Coming <S%G2064><s%> They Should Help <S%G4815><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Came, <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Filled <S%G4130><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ships, <S%G4143><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Were Sinking <S%G1036><s%> They. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Fell At <S%G4363><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Knees <S%G1119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Depart <S%G1831><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> A Sinner <S%G268><s%> Am I, <S%G1510><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G2285><s%> For Astonishment <S%G1063><s%> Laid Hold On <S%G4023><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Haul <S%G61><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fishes <S%G2486><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Had Taken; <S%G4815><s%>

<S%G3668><s%> And In Like Manner <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Partners <S%G2844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With Simon. <S%G4613><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2424><s%> Jesus, <S%G3361><s%> Fear Not; <S%G5399><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Henceforth <S%G3568><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Thou Shalt Be <S%G2071><s%> Capturing. <S%G2221><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Brought <S%G2609><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ships <S%G4143><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Land, <S%G1093><s%> Leaving <S%G863><s%> All <S%G537><s%> They Followed <S%G190><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As Was <S%G1511><s%> He <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Of The <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Cities, <S%G4172><s%> That <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> Of Leprosy, <S%G3014><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Falling <S%G4098><s%> Upon His <S%G1909><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> He Besought <S%G1189><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Thou Wilt <S%G2309><s%> Thou Art Able <S%G1410><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Cleanse. <S%G2511><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Stretched Out His <S%G1614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> He Touched <S%G680><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G2036><s%> I Will; <S%G2309><s%> Be Thou Cleansed. <S%G2511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leprosy <S%G3014><s%> Departed <S%G565><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Charged <S%G3853><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> To Tell; <S%G2036><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Having Gone <S%G565><s%> Shew <S%G1166><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Priest, <S%G2409><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Offer <S%G4374><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2512><s%> Thy Cleansing, <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Ordered <S%G4367><s%>, Moses, <S%G3475><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Testimony <S%G3142><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1330><s%> But Was Spread Abroad <S%G1161><s%> Still More <S%G3123><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Report <S%G3056><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Coming <S%G4905><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> To Hear, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Healed <S%G2323><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G769><s%> Their Infirmities. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G846><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Retiring <S%G5298><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deserts <S%G2048><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Praying. <S%G4336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Of The <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Teaching, <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Were <S%G2258><s%> Sitting By <S%G2521><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Teachers Of The Law, <S%G3547><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Village <S%G2968><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Judea <S%G2449><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Jerusalem : <S%G2419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Was There <S%G2258><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Heal <S%G2390><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Carrying <S%G5342><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> A Couch <S%G2825><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Paralysed, <S%G3886><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Sought <S%G2212><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Bring In <S%G1533><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Place Him <S%G5087><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having Found <S%G2147><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> What Way <S%G4169><s%> They Should Bring In <S%G1533><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Going Up <S%G305><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Housetop, <S%G1430><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tiles <S%G2766><s%> They Let Down <S%G2524><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Couch <S%G2826><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Their Faith <S%G846><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%>, To Him, <S%G846><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> Have Been Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Thy Sins. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Reason <S%G1260><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> Blasphemies? <S%G988><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G266><s%> Sins <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1921><s%> But Knowing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1261><s%> Their Reasonings <S%G846><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Reason Ye <S%G1260><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hearts <S%G2588><s%> Your? <S%G5216><s%>

Which <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Easier, <S%G2123><s%> To Say, <S%G2036><s%> Have Been Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Thy Sins, <S%G4675><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Say, <S%G2036><s%> Arise <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walk? <S%G4043><s%>

<S%G2443><s%> But That <S%G1161><s%> Ye May Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> To Forgive <S%G863><s%> Sins, <S%G266><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Paralysed, <S%G3886><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%>, Arise, <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken Up <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2826><s%> Thy Little Couch <S%G4675><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Thy. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G3916><s%> Having Stood Up <S%G450><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Taken Up That <S%G142><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was Lying, <S%G2621><s%> He Departed <S%G565><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> His House, <S%G846><s%> Glorifying <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Amazement <S%G1611><s%> Seized <S%G2983><s%> All, <S%G537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Filled <S%G4130><s%> With Fear, <S%G5401><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> We Have Seen <S%G1492><s%> Strange Things <S%G3861><s%> Today. <S%G4594><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> He Went Forth, <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saw <S%G2300><s%> A Tax Gatherer, <S%G5057><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Levi, <S%G3018><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Office, <S%G5058><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Left <S%G2641><s%>, All, <S%G537><s%> Having Arisen <S%G450><s%> He Followed <S%G190><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> Entertainment <S%G1403><s%> A Great <S%G3173><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Levi <S%G3018><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> His House, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> A Multitude <S%G3793><s%> Of Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Reclining At Table. <S%G2621><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Murmured <S%G1111><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1122><s%> Their Scribes <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Do Ye Eat <S%G2068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drink? <S%G4095><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> I Have Come <S%G2064><s%> To Call <S%G2564><s%> Righteous Ones, <S%G1342><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> Fast <S%G3522><s%> Often <S%G4437><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Supplications <S%G1162><s%> Make, <S%G4160><s%> In Like Manner <S%G3668><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But Those <S%G1161><s%> Of Thee <S%G4674><s%> Eat <S%G2068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drink? <S%G4095><s%>
